mapper.select: select l.mmsi, l.jssj as "update_time", s.cjsj as "register_time", s.cbmc as "name", s.zwmc as "name_cn", s.cbhx as "direction", s.dqhs as "velocity", s.cd as "length", s.kd as "width", l.zbjd as "lon", l.zbwd as "lat" from ( select * from (select * from (select * from ${tableName} order by jssj desc) group by mmsi) where zbjd > #{left} and zbjd < #{right} and zbwd > #{bottom} and zbwd < #{top} ) l, ship s where l.mmsi = s.mmsi
select count(*) from sqlite_master where name = #{tableName}
